ComicInfo.Summary:
Warrior Nun Areala is sent to Japan to investigate after men are seduced by demons and beheaded. Meanwhile, Colonel Ottoman is working to unlock the secret of "The Teutonic Knight," and Cheetah Diggers (from Gold Digger) happens to be in town tooâ€¦.
Regular Edition, ashcan, Special Limited Edition, and Special Edition covers.
